text: Yorai Lahav-Hertzanu (, born 5 August 1988 in Tel Aviv, Israel) is an Israeli politician. He was elected to the Knesset in 2019 where he currently serves as a member of the Yesh Atid political party. He is openly gay and campaigns for social justice, including LGBT rights.Israel 2019 elections: Meet the LGBTQ candidates A Wider Bridge, 19 March 2019 ==References== == Other websites == *Knesset Website of Yorai Lahav-Hertzanu Category:1988 births Category:Living people Category:Gay Jews Category:Israeli LGBT politicians Category:Jewish Israeli politicians Category:Members of the Knesset Category:Politicians from Tel Aviv Category:Tel Aviv University alumni Category:Yesh Atid politicians Category:LGBT in Israel
title: Yorai Lahav-Hertzanu
